Arun J wrote:

> May not be relevant to this thread but to your posting.
> 
> Can I do partial comparison using XMLUnit?  What I mean is check
> <firstname> and <lastname> and ignore/skip the rest type of
> comparison.

You can compare fragments of XML using assertXMLEqual().

Also, you can implement the DifferenceListener interface to ignore any 
kind of difference you want for a given test. I have an example of this 
in _JUnit Recipes_, chapter 9.

I hope this helps.
--
